info.name: Campus Marketplace API
info.description:
# Campus Marketplace API - Postman Collection

This Postman collection provides comprehensive testing capabilities for all Campus Marketplace backend APIs.

## üìÅ Collection File
- **File**: `Campus_Marketplace_API.postman_collection.json`
- **Location**: `/backend/Campus_Marketplace_API.postman_collection.json`

## üöÄ Quick Start

### 1. Import Collection
1. Open Postman
2. Click **Import** button
3. Select `Campus_Marketplace_API.postman_collection.json`
4. Click **Import**

### 2. Set Environment Variables
The collection uses these variables:
- `{{base_url}}`: API base URL (default: `http://localhost:8080`)
- `{{jwt_token}}`: JWT authentication token
- `{{user_id}}`: User ID for testing
- `{{category_id}}`: Category ID for testing
- `{{listing_id}}`: Listing ID for testing
- `{{transaction_id}}`: Transaction ID for testing
- `{{review_id}}`: Review ID for testing
- `{{report_id}}`: Report ID for testing
- `{{seller_id}}`: Seller ID for testing
- `{{message_id}}`: Message ID for testing

### 3. Authentication Setup
1. **Register/Login**: Use the Authentication endpoints to get a JWT token
2. **Set Token**: Copy the token from login response and set it in `{{jwt_token}}` variable
3. **Auto-Auth**: The collection is configured to use Bearer token authentication automatically

## üìã API Endpoints Overview

### üîê Authentication (`/api/auth`)
- **POST** `/register` - Register new user
- **POST** `/login` - Login and get JWT token
- **GET** `/me` - Get current user (requires auth)
- **POST** `/logout` - Logout user (requires auth)

### üë• Users (`/api/users`)
- **POST** `/` - Create user
- **GET** `/{id}` - Get user by ID
- **GET** `/` - Get all users
- **GET** `/email/{email}` - Get users by email
- **GET** `/name/{name}` - Get users by name
- **GET** `/role/{role}` - Get users by role
- **GET** `/status/{status}` - Get users by status
- **PUT** `/{id}` - Update user
- **DELETE** `/{id}` - Delete user

### üìÇ Categories (`/api/categories`)
- **POST** `/` - Create category
- **GET** `/{id}` - Get category by ID
- **GET** `/` - Get all categories
- **GET** `/name/{name}` - Get categories by name
- **PUT** `/{id}` - Update category
- **DELETE** `/{id}` - Delete category

### üõçÔ∏è Listings (`/api/listings`)
- **POST** `/` - Create listing
- **GET** `/{id}` - Get listing by ID
- **GET** `/` - Get all listings
- **GET** `/seller/{sellerId}` - Get listings by seller
- **GET** `/category/{categoryId}` - Get listings by category
- **GET** `/status/{status}` - Get listings by status
- **GET** `/condition/{condition}` - Get listings by condition
- **GET** `/price-range` - Get listings by price range
- **GET** `/search` - Search listings
- **GET** `/seller/{sellerId}/status/{status}` - Get listings by seller and status
- **GET** `/category/{categoryId}/status/{status}` - Paginated listings by category and status
- **GET** `/status/{status}/page` - Paginated listings by status
- **GET** `/seller/{sellerId}/page` - Paginated listings by seller
- **PUT** `/{id}` - Update listing
- **PATCH** `/{id}/status` - Update listing status
- **DELETE** `/{id}` - Delete listing

### üí∞ Transactions (`/api/transactions`)
- **POST** `/` - Create transaction
- **GET** `/{id}` - Get transaction by ID
- **GET** `/` - Get all transactions
- **GET** `/buyer/{buyerId}` - Get transactions by buyer
- **GET** `/seller/{sellerId}` - Get transactions by seller
- **GET** `/status/{status}` - Get transactions by status
- **GET** `/listing/{listingId}` - Get transactions by listing
- **PUT** `/{id}` - Update transaction
- **PATCH** `/{id}/status` - Update transaction status
- **DELETE** `/{id}` - Delete transaction

### ‚≠ê Reviews (`/api/reviews`)
- **POST** `/` - Create review
- **GET** `/{id}` - Get review by ID
- **GET** `/transaction/{transactionId}` - Get review by transaction ID
- **GET** `/` - Get all reviews
- **GET** `/reviewer/{reviewerId}` - Get reviews by reviewer
- **GET** `/seller/{sellerId}` - Get reviews by seller
- **GET** `/rating/{rating}` - Get reviews by rating
- **GET** `/seller/{sellerId}/rating/{rating}` - Get reviews by seller and rating
- **GET** `/seller/{sellerId}/average-rating` - Get average rating for seller
- **GET** `/seller/{sellerId}/count` - Get review count for seller
- **PUT** `/{id}` - Update review
- **DELETE** `/{id}` - Delete review

### üö® Reports (`/api/reports`)
- **POST** `/` - Create report
- **GET** `/{id}` - Get report by ID
- **GET** `/` - Get all reports
- **GET** `/reporter/{reporterId}` - Get reports by reporter
- **GET** `/moderator/{moderatorId}` - Get reports by moderator
- **GET** `/status/{status}` - Get reports by status
- **GET** `/target-type/{targetType}` - Get reports by target type
- **GET** `/target/{targetId}` - Get reports by target ID
- **GET** `/target-type/{targetType}/status/{status}` - Get reports by target type and status
- **PUT** `/{id}` - Update report
- **PATCH** `/{id}/assign-moderator` - Assign moderator to report
- **PATCH** `/{id}/status` - Update report status
- **DELETE** `/{id}` - Delete report

### üí¨ Messages (`/api/messages`)
- **POST** `/` - Send message (requires auth)
- **GET** `/{id}` - Get message by ID (requires auth)
- **GET** `/listing/{listingId}` - Get messages for listing (requires auth)
- **GET** `/conversation/{userId1}/{userId2}` - Get conversation between users (requires auth)
- **GET** `/conversation/listing/{listingId}/{userId1}/{userId2}` - Get conversation for listing between users (requires auth)
- **GET** `/conversation/listing/{listingId}/{userId1}/{userId2}/page` - Get paginated messages for listing between users (requires auth)
- **GET** `/user/{userId}` - Get all messages for user (requires auth)
- **GET** `/user/{userId}?page=0&size=20` - Get paginated messages for user (requires auth)
- **GET** `/partners/{userId}` - Get conversation partners for user (requires auth)
- **DELETE** `/{id}` - Delete message (requires auth)

### ‚ù§Ô∏è Wishlist (`/api/wishlist`)
- **POST** `/` - Add to wishlist
- **DELETE** `/{userId}/{listingId}` - Remove from wishlist
- **GET** `/user/{userId}` - Get user's wishlist
- **GET** `/{userId}/{listingId}` - Check if item is in wishlist
- **GET** `/user/{userId}/count` - Get wishlist count
- **GET** `/listing/{listingId}/count` - Get wishlist count for listing
- **GET** `/listing/{listingId}` - Get users who wishlisted listing
- **DELETE** `/user/{userId}` - Clear user's wishlist

### üè• Health Check (`/health`)
- **GET** `/health` - Check API server status

## üîß Testing Workflow

### 1. Basic Setup
1. **Start Server**: Ensure backend server is running on `http://localhost:8080`
2. **Health Check**: Test `/health` endpoint to verify server is running
3. **Register User**: Create a test user account
4. **Login**: Get JWT token and set it in `{{jwt_token}}` variable

### 2. Data Creation Flow
1. **Create Category**: Create a category for listings
2. **Create User**: Create a seller user
3. **Create Listing**: Create a listing with the category and seller
4. **Create Transaction**: Create a transaction for the listing
5. **Create Review**: Create a review for the completed transaction

### 3. Advanced Testing
1. **Search & Filter**: Test various search and filter endpoints
2. **Pagination**: Test paginated endpoints with different page sizes
3. **Authentication**: Test protected endpoints with/without valid tokens
4. **Error Handling**: Test with invalid data to verify error responses

## üìù Sample Request Bodies

### Register User
```json
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "password": "password123",
  "role": "USER",
  "status": "ACTIVE"
}
```

### Login
```json
{
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "password": "password123"
}
```

### Create Category
```json
{
  "name": "Electronics"
}
```

### Create Listing
```json
{
  "sellerId": "{{user_id}}",
  "title": "iPhone 13 Pro",
  "description": "Excellent condition iPhone 13 Pro",
  "price": 899.99,
  "categoryId": "{{category_id}}",
  "condition": "EXCELLENT",
  "images": ["image1.jpg", "image2.jpg"],
  "status": "ACTIVE"
}
```

### Create Transaction
```json
{
  "listingId": "{{listing_id}}",
  "buyerId": "{{user_id}}",
  "finalPrice": 899.99
}
```

### Create Review
```json
{
  "transactionId": "{{transaction_id}}",
  "reviewerId": "{{user_id}}",
  "sellerId": "{{seller_id}}",
  "rating": 5,
  "comment": "Great seller, fast delivery!"
}
```

### Create Report
```json
{
  "reporterId": "{{user_id}}",
  "targetType": "LISTING",
  "targetId": "{{listing_id}}",
  "reason": "Inappropriate content"
}
```

### Send Message
```json
{
  "listingId": "{{listing_id}}",
  "toUserId": "{{seller_id}}",
  "content": "Hi! Is this item still available?"
}
```

### Add to Wishlist
```json
{
  "userId": "{{user_id}}",
  "listingId": "{{listing_id}}"
}
```

## üîç Common Response Codes

- **200 OK**: Successful GET request
- **201 Created**: Successful POST request
- **204 No Content**: Successful DELETE request
- **400 Bad Request**: Invalid request data
- **401 Unauthorized**: Missing or invalid authentication
- **404 Not Found**: Resource not found
- **500 Internal Server Error**: Server error

## üõ†Ô∏è Environment Variables Setup

Create a Postman environment with these variables:

| Variable | Description | Example Value |
|----------|-------------|---------------|
| `base_url` | API base URL | `http://localhost:8080` |
| `jwt_token` | JWT authentication token | `eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9...` |
| `user_id` | Test user ID | `123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000` |
| `category_id` | Test category ID | `456e7890-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001` |
| `listing_id` | Test listing ID | `789e0123-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002` |
| `transaction_id` | Test transaction ID | `012e3456-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003` |
| `review_id` | Test review ID | `345e6789-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174004` |
| `report_id` | Test report ID | `678e9012-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174005` |
| `seller_id` | Test seller ID | `901e2345-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174006` |
| `message_id` | Test message ID | `789e0123-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174008` |

## üö® Important Notes

1. **Authentication**: Most endpoints require JWT authentication. Set the token after login.
2. **Data Dependencies**: Some endpoints depend on data created by other endpoints (e.g., reviews need transactions, messages need listings).
3. **Validation**: Request bodies must match the expected DTO structure.
4. **Error Handling**: Check response status codes and error messages for debugging.
5. **Server Status**: Ensure the backend server is running before testing.

## üìö Additional Resources

- **Swagger UI**: Visit `http://localhost:8080/swagger-ui.html` for interactive API documentation
- **API Documentation**: See `API_DOCUMENTATION.md` for detailed API specifications
- **Authentication Guide**: See `AUTHENTICATION.md` for authentication details
- **Testing Guide**: See `TESTING_AUTH.md` for authentication testing

## üîÑ Collection Updates

This collection covers all current API endpoints. When new endpoints are added:
1. Update the collection JSON file
2. Update this README with new endpoint documentation
3. Add sample request bodies for new endpoints
4. Update environment variables if needed

---

**Happy Testing! üöÄ**
